summary: Completed comprehensive testing of SIAKAD MVP. Backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend login, dashboard, and basic navigation functional. Critical frontend issue identified with Select components causing runtime errors.

critical_bugs.issue: Runtime error: Select.Item must have a value prop that is not an empty string
critical_bugs.impact: Prevents navigation to some pages, blocks form submissions in Program Studi and other forms
critical_bugs.error_details: SelectItem components missing proper value props, causing React runtime errors

ui_bugs.issue: Dropdown options not clickable in modal dialogs
ui_bugs.workaround: Use force=True in automation, but users cannot interact normally

passed_tests: Frontend Dashboard displays with stats cards
Frontend Tahun Akademik page and CRUD
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix Select component value prop issues in frontend. All Select.Item components need proper value props. This is blocking form submissions and causing runtime errors that prevent users from accessing key functionality like Program Studi creation, Mahasiswa/Dosen management.

success_percentage.frontend: 70% - Login, dashboard, basic navigation work. Select component issues block advanced functionality
